column4: i just installed proftp, and when i start it i get this error: - IPv6 getaddrinfo 'localhost.localdomain' error: Name or service not known
any idea?
add your boxs name to the /etc/hosts
i have - 127.0.0.1 localhost.localdomain localhost ubuntu
should look like this http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/14494/
I had the same problem; was told this is not something to worry about; unless you actually use ipv6
yeah, but i dont like to see error messages, lol, this is what i put, ::1 ip6-localhost ip6-loopback ubuntu
did it work?
do i need to restart networking?
I can't remember, it wouldn't hurt, you could also log out and log back in
ok
try to start the service before you do any of that though
ok
it didnt work, this is my /etc/hosts - http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/14496/
where ubuntu is the system name
ok give me a sec
sure
I cant be of much help take a look here I've posted what I can sorry http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/14500/
thanks, its appreciated :)
np
its fixed, this is how i did it: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/14501/
once again thanks for the help :)
cool, no problem
